ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | odsubdvds.1 | |- O = ( od ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( G |`s S ) = ( G |`s S ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_subggrp | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_subgbas | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> S = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> S e. Fin ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) e. Fin ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> A e. S ) |
| 10 | 9, 6 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> A e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( od ` ( G |`s S ) ) = ( od ` ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_oddvds2 | |- ( ( ( G |`s S ) e. Grp /\ ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) e. Fin /\ A e. ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) -> ( ( od ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` A ) || ( # ` ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 8, 10, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> ( ( od ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` A ) || ( # ` ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 1, 12 | #P_subgod | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. S ) -> ( O ` A ) = ( ( od ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> ( O ` A ) = ( ( od ` ( G |`s S ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 17 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> ( # ` S ) = ( # ` ( Base ` ( G |`s S ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 16, 17 | #P_3brtr4d | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ S e. Fin /\ A e. S ) -> ( O ` A ) || ( # ` S ) ) |
